role_dependencies: Ensures Snap is installed on Linux systems
role_description: An Ansible role that installs Skype on nearly any platform
role_description_full_overview: [Skype](https://www.skype.com/en/) is a proprietary telecommunications application that specializes in providing video chat and voice calls between computers, tablets, mobile devices, the Xbox One console, and smartwatches over the Internet. Skype also provides instant messaging services. Users may transmit text, video, audio and images.
